subject: For your Sunset Saxophone Tradition — RAV Vast + Live Looping
body:
Hi Phi Beach team,

Your live saxophone tradition during sunset is exactly my approach — but with RAV Vast steel tongue drum.

The format: RAV Vast + percussive guitar + vocals + Ableton. Starts meditative on the rocks, builds to organic house. 60-90 min sunset-to-night journey.

Background: 4-year resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore). Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes).

Here's my sunset set: youtu.be/K7oROUjuLGQ

Open to a trial set for summer 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

subject: For Sublime Sunset Sessions — RAV Vast + Live Looping Act
body:
Hi Sublime Comporta team,

Your golden sand sunset sessions are exactly what I do at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore, 4 years resident).

The format: RAV Vast + percussive guitar + vocals + Ableton. Starts meditative, builds to organic house. Perfect natural beach acoustics.

Background: Villa Porta resident since 2022. Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes).

Here's my sunset set: youtu.be/K7oROUjuLGQ

Open to a trial set for 2026 season?

Alessio "Flutur"

subject: For your Cone Club Sunset Rituals — RAV Vast Live Performance
body:
Hi 7Pines team,

Your daily sunset rituals at Cone Club are exactly what I specialize in — but with live instruments.

For 4 years I've been resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore, 4-star boutique), delivering Buddha Bar-style sunset meditation concerts every Friday.

The format: RAV Vast steel tongue drum + live looping. Meditative, elegant, perfectly suited for luxury sunset programming.

Here's my meditation style: youtu.be/I-lpfRHTSG4

Open to explore a collaboration for 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

subject: Artist Residency Proposal — RAV Vast Sunset Sessions
body:
Hi Gecko team,

Your boutique hotel + beach club combination is perfect for artist residencies — exactly what I'm looking for.

For 4 years I've been resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore, 4-star boutique), delivering Buddha Bar-style sunset meditation concerts every Friday, July-August.

The format: RAV Vast + live looping. Meditative, experimental, intimate. Perfect for your boutique guests.

Here's my meditation style: youtu.be/I-lpfRHTSG4

Open to discuss a summer 2026 residency?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

subject: For your Sunday Sunset Spins — RAV Vast + Live Looping
body:
Hi Papagayo team,

Your legendary Sunday sunset sessions are exactly what I do at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore) every Friday.

The format: RAV Vast + percussive guitar + vocals + Ableton. Starts meditative, builds to high-energy organic house — perfect for your 10 AM to 4 AM transformation.

Background: Villa Porta resident 4 years. Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes).

Here's my club style: youtu.be/FkBwJJS2ZxQ

Open to a trial Sunday for 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur
